word:
Encouragement.--Though we have come short of doing what we might have done for our youth and children in the past, let us now repent and redeem the time. The Lord says. "If ye be willing and obedient, ye shall eat the good of the land: but if ye refuse and rebel ye shall be devoured with the sword."--Sp. Test., pp. 197, 202. 


                     -21-
